title: mind trip
review:
First of all, when I saw Eric Roberts having 2 names in the IMDB page made me curious and watch this one out at 2 in the morning, the story is very easy to understand and the ending was well explained also, plus 1 on that though I would have loved to have some of the scenes shortened and the flashback scenes were way too often IMHO....the cast was average at best though I think the main character should have given more.....

Notes: No nudity, just some cleavage stuff and try it at your own time and risk...

5/10 for me

title: Great story!!!
review: A great movie about drug addiction and ones plate to take back control!!

title: Life is too short for such movies.
review:
"What Holly would do, is like nothing Mark has ever experienced before."
Well, I didn't last to that part. I was done with it in 30 min.
It feels like c-grade movie. Bad, just bad.
